definitions.definition: Of or relating to the belief that human actions are motivated only or primarily by base desires or selfishness .
Skeptical of the integrity , sincerity , or motives of others.
Bitterly or jadedly distrustful or contemptuous ; mocking .
Showing contempt for accepted moral standards by one's actions.
Like the actions of a snarling dog , especially in reference to facial nerve paralysis .

main_definition: Of or relating to the belief that human actions are motivated only or primarily by base desires or selfishness .
secondary_definitions: Skeptical of the integrity , sincerity , or motives of others.
Bitterly or jadedly distrustful or contemptuous ; mocking .
Showing contempt for accepted moral standards by one's actions.
( medicine , rare ) Like the actions of a snarling dog , especially in reference to facial nerve paralysis .
